questions.question: As the Comanches were to riding horses - the Caddo were to:
Why were some early Texan tribes nomadic?

choices.answer: they needed to follow the grazing animals for survival
they needed to find water sources
they were in search of better technology
they were in search of new caves

questions.question: Which of these was not one of the reasons for Spanish exploration of Texas?
Which of these events took place in 1519?

choices.answer: Coronado traveled through Texas in search of the 7 cities of Cibola
Pineda mapped and explored the Texas coast
Moscoso de Alvarado met the Caddos in East Texas

questions.question: Which group assisted the survivors of the ill-fated Panfilo de Narvaez expedition when they washed ashore?
The development of agriculture allowed the Native Americans to settle in one place.
Which of these events is Alvar Nunez Cabeza de Vaca best known for?

choices.answer: First European to see and explore the interior of Texas
Searched and led expeditions to find the fabled "cities of gold"
First European to see and map the Texas coastline
Searched and led expeditions to the Grand Canyon

questions.question: What effect did glaciers have on humans coming to the Americas?

choices.answer: The North Sea was created, making an easy route to the Americas
They had  little to no effect
A land bridge was formed between Asia and the Americas

questions.question: Why did Spain feel threatened by the French colony at Fort St. Louis?

choices.answer: This new French fort was holding a large number of french troops
They were trading with the Karankawa and making them hostile to Spain
It violated a peace treaty between Spain and France
This new French fort was built in territory claimed by Spain

questions.question: What were the results of Coronado's report to the Spanish king about his expedition?

choices.answer: He wrote that there were vast amounts of gold and Spain must keep looking
He wrote that they should hire The Turk to continue as his guide
He wrote that there was a lot of good soil for farming, but no gold
He wrote of the overwhelming kindness of the Native Americans

questions.question: What was the name of the Spanish empire in the Americas?
Which of these explorers washed ashore on the coast and was the first to see the interior of Texas?
The major reason for the viceroy funding Coronado's expedition was to explore Texas and make peace with the natives.
The Jumano and Tigua made their homes of tree limbs, grass, rabbit skins and mud.
What do archaeologists study to learn about Native Americans who live in Texas?
Which of these is an example of agriculture?

choices.answer: trading with other tribes for useful items
growing corn, squash, beans and other foods

questions.question: Which two Native American groups were sedentary - or stayed primarily in one place?
Another term for a tribe that stays in one place to farm and develop a complex society is known as
